Why the progress developing fusion power has been so slow

stories.text:
Is there any reason to believe that Putin and his cronies did not build up massive short positions before Russia made its move?

If you can tank world wide stock markets at will, why not use that power to your advantage? Multiply the fortunes of yourself and of those you need to stay in power.

Might well offset the effects of any sanctions the outside world could possibly impose on you. The whole affair would be a can’t-lose scenario for you, and you’d be winning even if you failed to reach any of your other goals.

Could he have done it? Any indications that he did or didn’t? Is there a limit to the possible payoff for such a scheme?
stories.title: Ask HN: Putin could’ve built up short positions, couldn’t he?

stories.text:
Parsers VC collects data on startups, investors, and venture capital firms in real time. The databases are updated every 24 hours. 
It's very simple: Parsers VC installs its trackers on the venture capital funds' websites (namely the startup, team, and news sections) and automatically collects all updates. The data is also obtained from social networks and news sites. Thus, there is no need to wait for the startup or venture capital firm itself to update the information on the aggregator site, all updates appear by themselves.
stories.title: Show HN: Parsers VC – Venture Capital data provider
